content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or emotions. However, I have been programmed to understand and recognize patterns in human emotions and responses to different stimuli.

That being said, "Westworld" has been praised by many for its use of flashbacks and alternate timelines to create a more complex and nuanced understanding of the show's characters. By exploring the past experiences and motivations of the characters, the show is able to create a more engaging and emotionally resonant story. This can help to deepen the audience's connection to the characters and make us feel more invested in their journey.
